key.name: use-system-defaults
key.description: If true, get configuration from system defaults first. This flag will be reset on first start.

key.name: layout
key.description: Name of the file or basename of the current layout.

key.name: theme
key.description: Name of the file or basename of the current theme.

key.name: system-theme-tracking-enabled
key.summary: Track changes of the current GTK-theme.
key.description: Switch onboard themes of matching basenames in sync with the current GTK-theme.

key.name: system-theme-associations
key.description: List of encountered system themes (GTK-themes) and the Onboard themes they are linked to.

key.name: width
key.description: Window width of the keyboard area of Onboard.

key.name: height
key.description: Window height of the keyboard area of Onboard.

key.name: x
key.description: X position of the upper-left corner of Onboard on the screen.

key.name: y
key.description: Horizontal position of the upper-left corner of Onboard on the screen.

key.name: show-status-icon
key.summary: Show status icon instead of the classic minimize.
key.description: Display an icon in the notification area to hide and show onboard.

key.name: start-minimized
key.summary: Start onboard with a minimized window.
key.description: Do not display the onboard window on start; start onboard minimized.

key.name: xembed-onboard
key.summary: Show onboard when unlocking the screen.
key.description: Make onboard appear in conjunction to the dialog to unlock the screen.

key.name: show-tooltips
key.description: Show tooltips for certain buttons of the keyboard.

key.name: snippets
key.summary: Label and text for the snippet keys
key.description: Define labels and text lines for the snippet keys in the format index:label:text Allowed escape sequences are "\n" for newline, "\:" for a colon and "\\" for a backslash.

key.name: enable-scanning
key.description: Enable the scanning mode.

key.name: scanning-interval
key.description: Length of the pause between two steps in scanning mode.

key.name: key-label-font
key.description: Default font of key labels. Applies to all themes which don't specify their font.'

key.name: key-label-overrides
key.description: Optional key labels and and size groups that override the layouts labels. Merged with current themes key_label_overrides. Format: ["key_id:label:group",...]. Colons and backslashes have to be escaped as "\:" and "\\".

key.name: current-settings-page
key.description: Current tab page of onboard-settings.

key.name: show-click-buttons
key.description: Show mouse click buttons.

key.name: window-decoration
key.description: Show window title bar and frame.

key.name: force-to-top
key.description: Use window type hint 'DOCK' for Onboards main window. This allows Onboard to type into Unity dash.

key.name: keep-aspect-ratio
key.description: Constrain the size of the main window to the layout's aspect ratio.

key.name: transparent-background
key.description: Makes the background of the keyboard fully transparent.

key.name: transparency
key.description: Transparency of the keyboard window.

key.name: background-transparency
key.description: Transparency of the background of the keyboard window.

key.name: enable-inactive-transparency
key.description: Change transparency on inactivity.

key.name: inactive-transparency
key.description: Transparency after leaving onboards window.

key.name: inactive-transparency-delay
key.description: Delay in seconds from leaving Onboards window until the inactive transparency takes effect.

key.name: hide-click-type-window
key.description: When Hover Click is enabled, hide the system-provided window for click type selection.

key.name: enable-click-type-window-on-exit
key.description: Always enable the system provided window for click-type selection when exiting onboard.

key.name: auto-show-enabled
key.description: Auto-show Onboard for editable widgets. Requires enabling gnome-accessibility (at-spi2).

key.name: unoccluded-margin
key.description: Distance to stay away from a focused text widget.

key.name: sticky-key-release-delay
key.description: Time of inactivity in seconds until latched and locked modifiers and layer keys are released automatically. Leave at 0.0 to never automatically release them.

key.name: sticky-key-behavior
key.description: Controls the behavior of sticky keys, e.g. modifier and layer keys. Valid behaviors are: cycle (default), dblclick, latch, lock. Groups of keys or single keys may be assigned individual behaviors. Valid groups are 'all', 'modifiers' and 'layers'. Individual keys may be specified by their ids defined in the .layout files. Examples: ['lock'] - lock-only all keys ['cycle', modifiers:latch'] - cycle all keys, latch-only modifiers ['cycle', 'RTSH:lock'] - cycle all keys, lock-only right shift

key.name: window-state-sticky
key.description: Show keyboard and icon palette always on visible workspace.

key.name: in-use
key.summary: Show icon palette when onboard is minimized.
key.description: Display a floating icon when onboard is minimized. By clicking on it, onboard reappears.

key.name: width
key.description: Horizontal size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: height
key.description: Vertical size in pixel of the icon palette.

key.name: x
key.summary: Horizontal position of the icon palette.
key.description: Horizontal position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: y
key.summary: Vertical position of the icon palette.
key.description: Vertical position of the icon palette on the screen.

key.name: drag-threshold
key.description: Accidental resize and move protection. Threshold is the distance in pixels the pointer has to travel before the drag begins. -1 for system drag threshold, 0 to disable and any positive integer as custom threshold.

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Name of the file with the color scheme.

key.name: key-style
key.description: Drawing style of the keys. Valid values are currently "flat" and "gradient".

key.name: roundrect-radius
key.description: Radius of rounded corners around the keys. Range 0-100%, with 0 for fully rectangular keys.

key.name: key-size
key.description: Size of all keys relative to the layout definition in percent .

key.name: key-fill-gradient
key.description: Strength of the keys fill gradient. Range 0-100%, with 0 for flat color.

key.name: key-stroke-gradient
key.description: Strength of the keys outline gradient. Range 0-100%, with 0 for flat color.

key.name: key-gradient-direction
key.description: Direction of simulated incoming light. 0-360 degrees, where 0 stands for light from the top.

key.name: key-label-font
key.description: Font for key labels. May include the modifiers 'bold', 'italic', 'condensed', separated by spaces.

key.name: key-label-overrides
key.description: Optional key labels and and size groups that override the layouts labels. Format: ["key_id:label:group",...]. Colons and backslashes have to be escaped as "\:" and "\\".

key.name: disable-click-buttons
key.description: Disallow showing click buttons.

key.name: disable-hover-click
key.description: Disable Onboard's hover click button. Hover click can still be turned on in gnome system settings.

key.name: disable-preferences
key.description: Disallow opening Onboards preferences via button and status menu. Onboard-settings can still be started from the desktop shortcut and from command line.

key.name: disable-quit
key.description: Disallow quitting Onboard by pressing the quit button or choosing quit from the status menu. Onboard then only closes by sending SIGTERM, i.e. killing it.

key.name: disable-touch-handles
key.description: Never show the enlarged move/resize handles for touch and hover click users.
